job_description: Prefer student in: Minimum 3rd yearPrior CoopExperience Mandatory: NoCompany Profile:We’re Canada’s most innovative financial technology company. We help hard working,responsible Canadians save money and improve their lives.Grouplend is reinventingfinancial services for Canadians by using technology and datadriven systems to replace archaic and paper based processes. Our model is built arounddisrupting both product and experience, in areas where traditional players (e.g., banks andcredit cards) aren't living up to the standards that consumers expect and deserve.We are doing this by offering personal loans to qualified customers at better rates thancurrently available with an onlineexperience that doesn’t suck.We’re looking for a talented and well rounded Java developer with prior experience workingwith GWT (or willing to learn) to become a core part of our development team.If you’re interested in working in a fast paced environment with fun people looking to change theface of a $100+ billion dollar market, let us know!
job_requirements: Responsibilities & Duties:The Java Developer will work closely with the entire development team across all technicalaspects of the business and report directly the company’s CTO.Key responsibilities:● Design, build and test valuable new features and technologies● Communicate with executive team and other software developers on multipleprojects running concurrentlyRequired Qualifications:● Enrolled in undergraduate or graduate level degree in Computer Science, SoftwareEngineering or equivalent● Exceptional Java programming skills● Most importantly, passionate about learning and the opportunity to make a realdifference!Other Desirable Qualifications:● Familiarity with GWT (Google Web Toolkit) framework● Familiarity with Google App Engine● Familiarity with Eclipse● Familiarity with ObjectifyOpen To All Majors:No
